Scripts.OnMouseWheel: delta = -delta * 15 local s = math.max(0, self:GetVerticalScroll() + delta) s = math.min(self.maxScroll, s) self:SetVerticalScroll(s) self.slider:SetValue(s)
delta = -delta * 15 local s = math.max(0, self:GetVerticalScroll() + delta) s = math.min(self.maxScroll, s) self:SetVerticalScroll(s) self.slider:SetValue(s)
